title: XJ-Carl
author: XJ-Carl
content: https://xonmining.com/product/antminer-e9-pro/Antminer E9 Pro For Sale, Bitmain E9 Pro 2200W ETC Miner, EtHash algorithm, maximum hashrate is 3.68Gh/s, power consumption is 2200W. The Antminer E9 Pro has a bare size of 195*290*400mm and weighs 14.2 kg without packaging. Among all Bitmain models, the E9 Pro Miner is relatively heavy.  It uses the traditional fan cooling design, with 4 cooling fans, and heat dissipation performance is very good.  After the test, the noise value of the machine is 75db, in line with the prescribed noise value range, and can be safe to operate.  The suitable operating temperature of the machine is 5-40°C, and it is suitable for operating under 10-90% ambient humidity. The correct operating environment can effectively increase the service life of the machine.Specifications of Antminer E9 ProManufacturer   BitmainModel   Antminer E9 Pro (3.68Gh)Release   February 2023Size   195 x 290 x 400mmWeight   14200gNoise level   75dbFan(s)   4Power   2200WInterface   EthernetTemperature   5 – 40 °CHumidity   10 – 90 %Introduction of Antminer E9 ProAntminer E9 Pro is the latest and most powerful cryptocurrency mining hardware released by Bitmain. A leading manufacturer of Bitcoin mining hardware. It is designed specifically for mining Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization after Bitcoin. The Antminer E9 Pro is a highly efficient and powerful mining rig that offers the best possible return on investment for Ethereum miners.The Antminer E9 Pro is equipped with 32 Ethash ASICs, which are capable of delivering a hash rate of 3 GH/s. This is a significant improvement over the previous generation of Ethereum mining hardware,which typically delivered hash rates of 100-300 MH/s. The increased hash rate of the Antminer E9 Pro translates to higher mining profits for miners who use it.
